verdimeble: Verdi Meble. A manufacturer of upholstered furniture.
nasza firma: Our company was founded in 2012 and since then we have been constantly developing and expanding the group of our satisfied customers. We mainly manufacture leisure furniture to order. We took over the production of our furniture from the previous company and refined it with our ideas and modern solutions.
nasza praca: Our work is our passion, our company is above all - people with 20 years of experience in the furniture industry. Thanks to this structure, we have the possibility of close contact, which allows us to communicate and exchange insights and ideas, and this translates into the quality of our products.
jestesmy: We are able to meet the expectations of the most demanding customers, to whom we give endless possibilities in creating their furniture. We are flexible and open to our clients' suggestions. We make furniture according to our own projects and ideas and according to the guidelines of our clients.

produkcja: Furniture production - from design to execution
jestesmy producentem: We are a manufacturer of lounge furniture. For our clients, we make furniture that meets all individual guidelines. We deal with unit production that engages the input of all employees, thanks to which each piece of furniture that comes out of our hands is unique, original and has its own unique history.

Thanks to this structure, we have the possibility of close contact, which allows us to communicate and exchange insights and ideas, and this translates into the quality of our products.
w razie: If you have any questions related to our business, we will answer them by phone or in person. We provide you with our knowledge and experience and we will be happy to help you choose the best furniture solution.
znajduje sie: Our company is located at 118 Waleriana Łukasińskiego Street behind the shops.
